articles.title: First Chandipura Virus Death in Gujarat: 4-Year-Old Victim - Oneindia
articles.description: Gujarat confirms its first death from the Chandipura virus, a 4-year-old girl, amid an outbreak affecting multiple districts.- Watch Video on English Oneindia
articles.content: A 4-year-old girl in Gujarat has died from the Chandipura virus. This is the state's first confirmed death from this virus. There are 29 reported cases and 14 suspected deaths. The virus is spreading… [+1492 chars]
